text: Kurt Russell, who appeared in movies such as "Fucking Eight" and "Tombstone," has a frequent role on Facebook where he regularly works as a comic on social media. "The Senate, the Electoral College, the Supreme Court, the Border, the Institute, and more. When will we declare them enemies of the state?
